title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: May 10, 2023, 09:19:36 PMLast edit: September 21, 2023, 07:57:08 PM by Hhampuz
content: vbet needs little to no introduction with 20+ years of iGaming presence and countless of players from around the world. With their recent launch of vbetFTN which takes aim at the crypto side of iGaming we are launching this Signature campaign to help spread awareness. If you are a quality poster who frequents the gambling boards we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature and Avatar.Make a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in order to receive a payment.Make a minimum of 10 constructive posts in the gambling section each week that you participate in order to receive a payment. These 10 will count towards the 20 post/week requirement.Do not have legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member of bitcointalk.If you receive legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member during your stay you may be removed without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, this thread, any campaign/bounty thread as well as on boards/topics where your signature is not displayed will not count towards your weekly requirement.A maximum of 5 posts per day will be counted toward your weekly requirement.A maximum of 5 posts per week from Local boards will be counted toward your weekly requirement.You need to have received a minimum of 10 merit in the last 120 days to join this campaign.Do not wear any other Signature or avatar during your stay in this campaign, doing so will result in your removal without payment or notice.Do not enroll your main and any alt accounts you may have in this campaign, doing so will result in your removal without payment or notice.Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC address each Friday.Each week will run from Fridays > Thursdays with the cut-off being Thursdays at 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).This campaign will be open for Sr. Members, Hero Members and Legendary Members.vbetFTN reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to this campaign at their discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:7x Sr. Members - $55 in BTC/Week.8x Hero/Legendary Members - $70 in BTC/Week.The Signatures:Sr
